comment.author: 8256808@N02
comment._content: The Cheat is, as these things go, a reasonably famous American silent. It's available on DVD and stars pioneering actor Sessue Hayakawa. In 1993, it was placed on the National Film Registry, a selection of films preserved by the Library of Congress for being "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant."

comment.author: 46317563@N04
comment._content: The Cheat also came out in 1923 starring Pola Negri and Charles De Roche (Paramount Pictures)
